title: MY REMINDER – GPS Destination Reminder App (Multi-Screen Mobile UI)

requirements.text: Implement a Home Screen as the default landing view. It must display the app logo (generated icon), the title 'MY REMINDER' in large bold typography, a short tagline, and a prominent 'Set Destination' button styled with a golden/yellow fill on a dark background. The screen should use a dark cinematic black background (#0A0A0A / #111111) with yellow/golden accent color (#F5C518 or similar). Use rounded cards and Material Design–inspired layout suitable for mobile viewports.

quotes: Home screen with app logo, title, and 'Set Destination' button

acceptanceCriteria: Home screen renders with a dark background and displays the app logo image
Title 'MY REMINDER' is prominently displayed in bold golden/yellow typography
A 'Set Destination' button is visible and navigates to the Destination Input screen on click
Overall layout is clean, minimal, and uses rounded card styling

requirements.text: Implement a Destination Input Screen accessible from the Home Screen. It must include: (1) a styled search bar with a location pin icon and placeholder text 'Search destination…', (2) a map preview area rendered as a static visual placeholder card (no real GPS/map API) showing a stylized dark map tile with a golden marker pin, and (3) a 'Next' or 'Set Alert' button at the bottom to proceed to the Alert Settings screen. Maintain dark background and golden accent styling consistent with the Home Screen.

quotes: Destination input screen with a search bar and map preview

acceptanceCriteria: Destination Input screen is reachable from the Home screen's 'Set Destination' button
A search bar with icon is displayed at the top of the screen
A map preview card occupies the main content area with a visual placeholder showing a pin/marker
A navigation button proceeds to the Alert Settings screen
Styling follows dark cinematic black background with yellow/golden highlights

requirements.text: Implement an Alert Settings Screen accessible from the Destination Input Screen. It must include: (1) a section titled 'Remind Me Before Arrival' with three selectable option chips/buttons for '1 min', '2 min', and '5 min' — only one can be active at a time, highlighted in golden yellow when selected; (2) a sound toggle switch labeled 'Sound Alert' styled with a golden active state; (3) a 'Save Reminder' button as the primary CTA at the bottom; and (4) a back navigation option. All state (selected time option, sound toggle) is managed locally in React state.

quotes: Alert settings screen with options like 1 min, 2 min, 5 min before arrival, sound toggle, and save button

acceptanceCriteria: Alert Settings screen is reachable from the Destination Input screen
Three time option chips (1 min, 2 min, 5 min) are displayed; only the selected one is highlighted in golden yellow
A sound toggle switch is displayed with an on/off state and golden active styling
A 'Save Reminder' button is present at the bottom of the screen
Clicking 'Save Reminder' shows a confirmation toast/snackbar and returns the user to the Home screen
Styling is consistent with the dark cinematic black + golden accent design system

requirements.text: Implement a multi-screen navigation system (using React state or a simple router) connecting the three screens: Home → Destination Input → Alert Settings → (on save) Home. Include a top navigation bar on the Destination Input and Alert Settings screens with a back arrow icon and the current screen title in golden text.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation flows correctly: Home → Destination Input → Alert Settings → Home
Back navigation is available on Destination Input and Alert Settings screens
Top bar displays screen title with golden styling on non-home screens

requirements.text: Apply a consistent dark cinematic design system across all screens: background color #0A0A0A or #111111, primary accent color golden yellow (#F5C518 or #FFD700), all interactive cards and containers use rounded corners (border-radius ~16px), typography is modern sans-serif (e.g., Inter or system-ui) with varying weights, minimal iconography using outline-style icons, and the overall aesthetic targets young adult users with a professional and intuitive feel inspired by Android Material Design 3.

quotes: dark cinematic black background with yellow/golden highlights, minimal icons, rounded cards, and modern Android Material Design style. Make it professional, simple, and intuitive for young users

acceptanceCriteria: All screens use a near-black background (#0A0A0A–#111111 range)
Golden/yellow (#F5C518 or similar) is used consistently for headings, active states, buttons, and accents
All cards and containers have rounded corners (≥12px radius)
Typography is clean, modern, and legible at mobile-equivalent viewport widths
No blue or purple accent colors appear in the UI

requirements.text: Render the app in a mobile-frame wrapper (max-width ~390px, centered on desktop) to simulate a smartphone display, with a subtle dark outer frame or shadow to reinforce the mobile app aesthetic.
acceptanceCriteria: App content is constrained to a mobile-width container (~375–390px) centered on wider screens
A visual frame or shadow around the mobile container is visible on desktop viewports
No horizontal overflow or layout breaks occur at mobile widths

constraints: No real GPS or mapping API integrations — map preview must be a static visual placeholder
No backend persistence required; all reminder settings are managed in frontend React state only
Do not use blue or purple as accent colors
All user-facing text must be in English
nonGoals: Real-time GPS tracking or geofencing logic
Map tile API integration (Google Maps, Mapbox, etc.)

required: App logo icon: a circular golden location pin / radar wave mark on a dark background, modern minimal style (my-reminder-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Stylized dark map preview placeholder: a top-down dark map tile with streets in dark gray, a glowing golden marker pin at center, cinematic look (map-preview-placeholder.dim_390x260.png)
